about_the_game:
Drink, collect, design - your beer, your style!

Description:Welcome to Beer, the ultimate clicker game for anyone who likes to raise a pint (or ten) - virtually, of course!Here you tap and consume beer, collect epic skins for your mugs and build up an impressive collection.

What's it all about? Tap your beer and enjoy the moment as you regularly earn skins for your stein. Change the look of your mug, the colour of your beer or add cool effects to make your collection unique.

Features:🍺 Epic beer mug skins: After every tapping and drinking ritual, you have the chance to win new skins that can be traded on the Steam market. Make your mug your trademark!

🍺 Idle progress: Your bar works for you, even when you're not online. Log in and tap a beer every couple of hours - your beer will never run out!

🍺 Multiplayer (in planning): Soon you'll be able to clink glasses virtually with friends, compete in competitions and see who has the most stylish beer mug.

🍺 Events & exclusive drops: Celebrate special occasions such as Oktoberfest, summer parties and much more with limited skins and rewards.

🍺 Chilled fun: Perfect for in between - simple gameplay, maximum beer feeling.

Beer is more than just a clicker - it's your entry into a relaxed world where beer and style go hand in hand. Pull the tap and customise your beer like never before!

short_description: Click every few hours to keep your bar going and get epic beer skins. Customise your mug and beer, trade skins on the Steam market and expand your collection. Just relax, click and collect - your virtual beer experience!
